text: hqqana 'iidha wasalat alruwh 'iilaa aealy alsdr, waqal bed alhadirin lbed: hal min raq yarqyh wyashfyh mimaa hu fyh? wayqn almhtdr ann aladhi nazal bih hu firaq aldnya; lmeaynth malayikat almwt, watslt shdt akhar aldunya bshdt 'awal alakhrt, 'iilaa allah taealaa msaq aleabbad yawm alqyamt: 'iimaa 'iilaa aljanat wa'iimaa 'iilaa alnar
